short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Give your browser a bold, action-packed transformation with the Fortnite Breakpoint Live Wallpaper

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This live wallpaper captures the essence of the Fortnite Breakpoint character, known for her combat readiness and daring attitude. Watch as she takes command of your new tab, adding dynamic visuals and intense animations. Fortnite Breakpoint comes alive, bringing the thrill of Fortnite directly to your browser.

Key Features:
🎮 Breakpoint Live Wallpaper: Dive into the action with a fully animated, bold Fortnite character, showcasing Breakpoint in her ultimate form.
🔍 Integrated Search Bar: Effortlessly search the web using your preferred search engine, directly from your new tab.
🕒 Clock and Date: Keep track of time with an integrated clock and date display.
📌 Customizable Shortcuts: Add or remove shortcuts to your favorite websites for easy access.
⚙️ Extension Settings: Manage or remove the extension with ease via the settings in the bottom-left corner of your screen.
With the Fortnite Breakpoint Live Wallpaper, your browser becomes the battleground, bringing Fortnite’s fierce energy into your everyday browsing experience.
